name: grafana
tagline: A platform for visualizing data through dashboards and alerts
description: Grafana is a powerful data visualization and dashboarding platform that integrates with various data sources. It allows teams to build and share dashboards, alerts, and monitoring views. Available for self-hosting or managed cloud.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Create interactive dashboards with charts, graphs, and custom visualizations

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Connect to Prometheus, InfluxDB, Elasticsearch, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and dozens of other data sources

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Configure alerts with multiple notification channels including email, Slack, and PagerDuty

features.title: Dashboard Sharing
features.description: Share dashboards with teams, export as JSON, or embed in other applications

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with community and commercial plugins for data sources and panels

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Visual query editor and support for native query languages for each data source

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Role-based access control with teams, organizations, and folder permissions

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Choose between managed Grafana Cloud or self-hosted deployment
